main event: Observation of a bright red missile which disintegrated in mid-air on 5 Jul 58.
interesting points: The observation occurred east of Ascension Island., The object was described as a bright red missile., The object disintegrated in mid-air., The possibility of the object being a balloon or aircraft was mentioned., The report was part of Project Blue Book.
location: Ascension Island, South Atlantic Ocean, UK
witness description: Staff Duty Officer was Capt Anderson.
